body: i hate ntr but now im already used to it, (still hate ntr) but i like plot understanding the story like the seiso girlfriend doujin the tanned guy kinda a little gentleman he never let women to pay the food unlike the boyfriend.

.., but i just love to analyze hentai and not only, to find what script moves and manipulations authors do to entice more readers and please everyone, what they meant and who they wanted to offend or not, whether it was just hot hentai and author dont mean anything or he was trying to show his complexes and impose something, what mainstream stuff and clichés he used and so on, 
so I didn't want to offend anyone, well, except for those who get high by putting themselves in the place of the cuckloded MC and those who put themselves in the place of the "chad" and  act like that, all "manly" and rudely, bully ntr haters and everyone else who disagree even a bit with them, so yeah with these both categories is something wrong, even for comments below fiction for fap this too much, but for the rest - peace, this just plain hentai with some cheap clishes and hypocritick moves, but art  is pretty hot, but it didn't help me get aroused, to plain and a little nasty as i said, but you can try))

...so for me it's same here, secret nasty action, showing a nice guy who even though girl doesn't love him and they're not a couple a little humiliated by author, in ntr authors also like to do this, show normal people in love and then in contrast make wife spoiled slut say " I dont care about my belowed anymore, I love only your cock", there she didn't say that, but the author try to diminish MC and show that such slutty girls are the best for please readers, so even though that girl didn't say "fuck love, sex is best", she behaved that way and I didn't like this little bully of a this guy from the author, played on the contrast and made him look like a wimp and a fool in in front of "chad with big dick and money" as the ntr authors do, so for me this plain ntrlike hentai with same cheap tricks, gross things and with slight humiliation of MC guy, but yeah this not exactly ntr, just story about hoe like wrote dude below, but whatever this feels as boring and shitty as ntr for me...

..., but authors is trying to smooth the edges and show that "yes, she cheated and left her husband purely because of sex, but look she fell in love with her lover and now they are happy, she is not such a whore, so please, ntr haters fall for it and read our story". Well, of course they do it also for the sake of giving a thrill and an atmosphere of despair, even more humiliation of the MC, this is both for cuckolds who enjoy putting themselves in the hero's shoes and getting pleasure from it, and for those who consider themselves "chad" and who write some things like "cuckolds should die, stealing wifes is cool", call all who disagree with them cuckolds and other trashy nonsense...

yeah not ntr, but there are some things frome ntr, hoe who all cute and shiny but then show her slutty trueself, kind guy who tisnt pair for such whore, in such works authors often are played on contrasts, in ntr authors turn on readers by the atmosphere of betrayal, the secret forbidden action, corruption of nice faithful girl, and also by the contrast between the friendly faithful partner at home and when she act all whore but happy with lover...
